title: Who'll pay the buffalo bill?
creator_credit: Dione Gilmour and Australian Broadcasting Commission
brief_description: Robyn Williams reports on the consequences of the introduction of water buffaloes to the Northern Territory wetlands. He discusses their impact on the environment, how they were and are hunted, their role in spreading diseases and their effect on the pet food industry and the tourist trade.
